title: Delete test blog post titled 'Mat'

requirements.text: Delete the blog post with title 'Mat' authored by 'Henrik' that was created on February 23, 2026, which currently displays the content 'Mat för hjärtat'
acceptanceCriteria: The blog post with title 'Mat' is permanently removed from the backend data store
The post no longer appears in the list of all published posts on the home page
Attempting to access the post detail page for this deleted post returns an appropriate not found state
The deletion is verified to respect ownership rules (caller must be the post owner)

constraints: Only the authenticated owner (Principal matching the post's ownerId) can delete this post
The deletion must use the existing backend deletePost function with proper ownership verification
nonGoals: Modifying the delete button UI or confirmation dialog
Changing the deletion logic or ownership verification mechanism
